CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `blog` CHARACTER SET = utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `posts`( `id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `header` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `creationDate` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `publicationDate` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `isPublished` TINYINT(4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `id_UNIQUE` (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
